body_html: @persiyanov Your solution will actually be infinitely slow, since instead of defining the second derivative you're just calling the same function again and hoping that someone else will have defined the second derivative for you in the meantime. I.e., it's an infinite loop.
body_text: @persiyanov Your solution will actually be infinitely slow, since instead of defining the second derivative you're just calling the same function again and hoping that someone else will have defined the second derivative for you in the meantime.  I.e., it's an infinite loop.
